insert into tb_order
order_id,
order_no,
order_name,
order_price,
order_time,
order_mode,

mapper.update:
update tb_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_name = #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_mode = #{orderMode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_name = #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_mode = #{orderMode,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from tb_order o left join order_mode m on o.order_mode=m.mode_id
